parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Interaction

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Difficulty

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Shows a text hint only when in [[cadetMode]].

The text can contain several lines. \n is used to indicate the end of a line.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''hintCadet''' text

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value>  text: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[hintCadet]] "Press W to move forward";</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[hint]], [[hintC]], [[hintSilent]] [[cadetMode]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment>
<dt class="note">[[User:ArmAtec|ArmAtec]]</dt>
<dd class="note">hintCadet can be used with formatting like this:
<code>[[hintCadet]] [[format]]["Hello %1", [[player]]]</code>

<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
